http://hl7.org/fhir/DSTU2/medicationorder-definitions.html#MedicationOrder.dispenseRequest.numberOfRepeatsAllowed

for DSTU2, MedicationOrder.dispenseRequest.numberOfRepeatsAllowed the comment seems inconsistent:
it says:

If displaying "number of authorized refills", subtract 1 from this number.

I think that should read, 

If displaying "number of authorized fills", add 1 to this number.

since the field is explicitly ONLY refills, and not the original fill?
@Melva Peters @Jean Duteau
Yes, that was already changed in STU3.
